headline: $16.4 Bn Patient Handling Equipment Markets, 2030 by Patient Transfer (Ceiling Lifts, Stair Lifts, Slings), Medical Beds, Mobility Equipment (Walkers, Canes, Crutches), Stretchers
summary: The global patient handling equipment market is set to grow from USD 12.4 billion in 2025 to USD 16.4 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 5.8%. Key growth drivers include the aging population and rising prevalence of cardiovascular diseases, necessitating advanced and ergonomic devices. A surge in home healthcare services across North America, Europe, and Asia Pacific further boosts demand.
